title: Reinforcement Learning meets Halite
description: The purpose of this notebook is to answer some questions about how to approach making an RL Agent for Halite. An important note: great results have not been reached with this design, but this is mainly due to short training times, untuned hyperparameters, and a sparse reward system. The design that we will be looking at contains three parts: an agent, an agent helper, and an environment.   *Simulated Environment does not necessarily provide the reward
